comments.author: jdinbox@gmail.com
comments.creator: jdinbox@gmail.com
comments.text:
I just updated https://people.mozilla.com/~dolske/awesome.html to work on trunk, it was previously using the mozOrientation event.

On my OS X laptop (~8 month old MBP), the rotation works properly, such that the image stays level with the real world.

On my Android device, the image rotates in the wrong direction.

Other folks have reported their laptops rotate the wrong way too. I'm not sure which is "correct", but they should at least be consistent!
comments.raw_text:
I just updated https://people.mozilla.com/~dolske/awesome.html to work on trunk, it was previously using the mozOrientation event.

On my OS X laptop (~8 month old MBP), the rotation works properly, such that the image stays level with the real world.

On my Android device, the image rotates in the wrong direction.

Other folks have reported their laptops rotate the wrong way too. I'm not sure which is "correct", but they should at least be consistent!

comments.text: FWIW, I'm seeing this rotate the wrong way on the latest nightly on my MBP.
